product_name: Oakley Oakley Works Storm Pack - 35L - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Sporting a rain cover and padded sleeves for a 17-in. laptop and tablet, this 35-liter pack hauls your stuff on a weekend getaway, an action-packed adventure or a jaunt to work through the city.
short_description: Sporting a rain cover and padded sleeves for a 17-in. laptop and tablet, this 35-liter pack hauls your stuff on a weekend getaway, an action-packed adventure or a jaunt to work through the city.
